name: opabbi
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(w0, w1))), wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1)))

stmt.origin: biimpri(wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(w0, w1))), wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w1)))

comment: Equality deduction for class abstraction of ordered pairs. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 10-Apr-2018.)
